en: Respone
Increase the target's temperature by 1.
Increase the target's temperature by 2.
Increase the temperature of a creatures you own by 1.
Decrease the target's temperature by 1.
Decrease the target's temperature by 2.
Destroy a cold creature with temperature -3 or greater.
Desroy all hot creatures with temperature 2 or lower.
Increase temperature of all ally creatures by 1.
Decrease temperature by 2 when attacked.
Increase temperature by 2 when attacked.
Moves the target creature to it's owners hand.
Changes the target's temperature 2 points toward zero.
Sacrife a creature and destroy all weaker creatures.
Draw 3 cards.
Invert the target's temperature.
Increase the owners temperature by 2.
Decrease the owners temperature by 2.
Destroy all creatures with temperature between -2 and 0.
Destroy all creatures with temperature between 0 and 2.
Spawns 2 Fire Elementals when destroyed.
Decreases the attackers temperature by 1 when attacked in battle.
Increases the attackers temperature by 1 when attacked in battle.
Destroys the attacker if it's level is at most 3 when attacked in battle.
Destroys the attacker if it's level is at most 5 when attacked in battle.
Sacrifice all creatures you own and increase this creatures temperature by their total temperature.
Move the target creature's temperature 1 point towards the global temperature.
